Patient 32: Patient 32 is a 50-year-old male with a history of type 1 diabetes and chronic kidney disease stage 2. He manages his diabetes with insulin therapy, including both long-acting and rapid-acting insulins. His kidney function is monitored regularly due to his diabetes, and he takes lisinopril to protect his renal function. There is no documented family history of kidney disease, and he has no known allergies. His medication list has remained stable over the past year.
